title: 1BR/1BA Upper in NoHo
posting_body: ['Looking forward to Summer Vacay?', 'This newly painted upper will give you sunny Santorini vibes all year round with its deep blue cabinetry and bright white walls!', 'Enter your spacious living room and smile at the warmly colored wood floor while taking in the light from your large North-facing window!', 'This will give you all-day light while keeping your living space cool.', "Across the room to your right you see an area that's perfect for a small dining table--it's right next to the kitchen for easy comestible access.", "Enter the kitchen and feel at peace as the cerulean cabinets surround you with the color of the ocean--but no need to create your own body of water in this stainless-steel kitchen sink; this unit comes with it's own dishwasher!", "Check out that sleek subway tiling backsplash, too--now you REALLY feel like you're in the Greek Isles!", 'You pass through the doorway and your heart does a little leap--this hallway is covered in built-ins!', 'With floor-to-ceiling cabinets, not one inch of space is wasted!', 'Is that retro tiling you see in the bathroom??', 'And not only is there extra storage behind the mirror, but yet another built-in cabinet to the right of the sink!', 'Now onto the bedroom...', 'As you enter you do a little spin and catch a glimpse of yourself in the mirrored built-in closet!', 'This space is large enough for a King-Sized bed.', "And with a wall A/C in both living spaces, you'll stay cool all day long.", 'Nestled between the 170 and the 5, you can make this neighborhood your own!', 'Enjoy a morning stroll to grab a java at your new coffee and bake shop--Continental Bakery!', 'Or head a block North to grab a slice at Old Sicily Pizza.', 'Not feeling Italian tonight?', "A few streets over, you'll find a variety of options; the world is your oyster in this neighborhood--seafood abounds from Sushi at Chiba to Mexican at Casa 7 Mares.", '-Dishwasher', '-Parking space included!', '-Coin-Op laundry', '-Wall A/C', '-Deposit is 1 month', '-Housing Provider pays for water and trash', '-Pets considered w/ additional deposit']
